channel.title: Web Service on Gavin
channel.description: Recent content in Web Service on Gavin

item.title: Difference between Web Service and API
item.description: There is a common misconception that API and Web Service are the same. These are especially true when people use both of the words interchangeably. One key thing to keep in mind: Comparing API and Web Service is like comparing Fruit and Apple. While all apples are a kind of fruit, not all fruits are apples. Definitions API is an acronym for Application Programming Interface that allows two applications to interact with each other without any user interaction.
